title: Cafe Nomad
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafeteria and ice cream parlor on the seafront offering healthier food.Has plan milks for drinks (soya, rice, oat, almond and hazelnut); vegan ice cream; bircher muesli; smoothies; veggie burgers; salads; and sandwiches with filling such as hummus, smashed avocado, tomato and garlic paste.
streetAddress: Paseo Maritimo Fuengirola Rey de Espa√±a 3
